name: Grave Keeper (itch)
description:
Controls:

 w a s d - move around and jump.

spacebar - use shovel to dig up graves (you have to have your wheelbarrow with you).

objective - bring graves to revival orb.

Story:

Grave Keeper has you play as an old king who executed too many of his subjects and deeply regretted it, in this puzzle platformer you explore the graveyard, bringing as many graves into the holy light as you can to progress; the twist? You are alone with your wheelbarrow and shovel, without them you cannot complete you task so keep your wheelbarrow in sight, using it to push obstacles and move subjects.

Developers:

PremedLynx - Programming, Sound.

plackett - Art, Animation.
